intro: Hofmeisteria tenuis, commonly known as the slender hofmeisteria, is a flowering plant species native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, delicate leaves and clusters of white or pale yellow flowers. It typically grows in shaded, moist environments such as forest undergrowth. Hofmeisteria tenuis is relatively rare and is of interest to botanists due to its unique morphology and limited distribution.
